Markdown flavour
Nov 5, 2016 TWEET LINK

I have some text.

I want some italics.

I want some bold.

this is heading 1

this is heading 2

this is heading 3

you want a list? * first * second * third

you want an ordered list? 1. whatever 1. whatever 1. whatever
